sense.name: collection
sense.commentary: any number of entities considered as a unit
sense.examples: A large group walked in. The whole group of stuffed animals were piled on the bed. Fido's favorite musical group is called 'Cats Stink'.

sense.name: chemical group
sense.commentary: radical - two or more atoms bound together as a single unit and forming part of a molecule
sense.examples: Chlorine is in a chemical group called halogens.

sense.name: a set
sense.commentary: a set that is closed, associative, has an identity element and every element has an inverse
sense.examples: The group in problem five includes the numbers 7, 3, and 5.
